Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCCB 741(MIC=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli MTCCB 1610(MIC=512µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCCB 96(MIC=128µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis NCIM 2063(MIC=512µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=256µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MIC=125µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MBC=250µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=125µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=250µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=250µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MBC=250µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=250µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=500µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 8196(MIC=500µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 8196(MBC=500µg/ml),Candida tropicalis NCTC 7393(MIC=125µg/ml),Candida tropicalis NCTC 7393(MFC=250µg/ml),Levilactobacillus brevis L1055 (90-100% Inhibition=14.4µg/ml),Lapidilactobacillus dextrinicus DSM 20293(90-100% Inhibition=17.3µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(90-100% Inhibition=>40µg/ml),Bacillus cereus NCIMB 1526(90-100% Inhibition=>40µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium SL1344(90-100% Inhibition=>40µg/ml),Escherichia coli MG1655(90-100% Inhibition=>40µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NCIMB 950   (90-100% Inhibition=>40µg/ml)
